home.description: A modern foundation for scalable web applications
home.foundation: A powerful foundation for modern web applications
home.tagline: Built for speed, quality, and developer experience

features.title: Built With
features.viteDesc: Lightning-fast development with instant server start and hot module replacement.
features.eslintDesc: Consistent code quality across your entire project with integrated linting.
features.reactDesc: Component-based UI development with the power of hooks and modern React patterns.
features.typescriptDesc: Type safety and enhanced developer experience with full TypeScript support.

cta.githubAriaLabel: View VERT Stack source code on GitHub

about.title: About the VERT Stack
about.description: A powerful foundation for modern web applications, combining Vite, ESLint, React, and TypeScript to deliver fast, reliable, and type-safe development experiences.

speed.title: Lightning Fast Development
speed.description: Built on Vite for instant server start and blazing fast HMR, making development a joy.

quality.title: Code Quality First
quality.description: Integrated ESLint configuration ensures consistent, high-quality code across your entire project.

types.title: Type Safety
types.description: Full TypeScript integration provides robust type checking and enhanced developer tooling.

modern.title: Modern Best Practices
modern.description: Incorporates current web development standards, accessibility, and performance optimizations.

teams.title: Development Teams
teams.description: Perfect for teams who value code quality, type safety, and development speed.

projects.title: Production Projects
projects.description: Ready for real-world applications with built-in optimization and testing infrastructure.

contact.title: Join the VERT Stack Community
contact.description: Connect with developers, get real-time support, and stay updated with the latest VERT Stack developments.

community.title: Community Chat via Telegram and WhatsApp

apiExample.title: API Integration Example
apiExample.description: This page demonstrates API integration patterns in the VERT stack, showcasing error handling, loading states, and data presentation.
apiExample.metaDescription: Explore our API integration example using the VERT Stack. Learn how to fetch and display data efficiently in your React applications.
